Text: Very impressive collection -- thanks so much. But some of the files are truly massive (150 mb and up), and much smaller djvu versions of many of the bigger ones are available at gp/ln -- sometimes more than 90% smaller.

THANK YOU sooooo much for this very impressive collection.  I registered on this site so that I could thank you. 

All the best
This is amazing. Thank you so much for this collection, it will greatly improve my study.
You mutherfuker!  This is awesome.  Thank u so much, dude!
